title: Product Manager Intern
job_description: About TypefaceWe help the world’s biggest brands move from brief to fully personalized campaigns — in days, not months. Founded by Abhay Parasnis and backed by Microsoft, GV, Salesforce, Lightspeed, Madrona and Menlo, we’re building category-defining technology at the intersection of creativity and AI with real impact. Join us to help shape the future of enterprise marketing. What You’ll Do As a Product Manager - Intern, you will gain hands-on experience contributing to innovative product initiatives and collaborating with cross-functional teams. This role is ideal for someone passionate about technology, user experience, and growth strategies. You’ll have the opportunity to make a meaningful impact, learning from a team of experienced professionals while developing skills in product management and growth strategies. How You'll Make an Impact Collaborate with product, engineering, design, and marketing teams to build delightful and intuitive product experiences. Assist in identifying and prioritizing product improvement opportunities using data-driven insights. Support the development and execution of product-led growth experiments to enhance user acquisition, activation, retention, and revenue. Contribute to user research initiatives to better understand customer needs and pain points. Help track and analyze key growth and user engagement metrics, presenting findings to stakeholders. Work on A/B testing and optimization strategies to improve conversion rates across the user journey. What You Bring Current enrollment in a Bachelor’s or Master’s program in business, marketing, computer science, or a related field. Passion for designing intuitive user experiences and simplifying complex workflows. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and inform product decisions. Interest in growth strategies, A/B testing, and product-led growth. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. A proactive mindset with a willingness to learn and contribute to a fast-paced environment. Bonus: Experience with data analysis tools like Excel, Tableau, or Looker. Bonus: Familiarity with SQL or other analytical tools is a plus. Bonus: Previous internship experience in product management, design, or growth marketing is a bonus. What we offer Hands-on experience working with a leading enterprise GenAI product. Mentorship and learning opportunities from industry experts. Hybrid work schedule with access to our Palo Alto office. A collaborative, inclusive, and supportive work culture. LocationThis is a hybrid role based in our Palo Alto HQ. We collaborate in-office 3 days a week. Pay range: $40.00-$60.00 hourlyBenefits Competitive compensation — including salary, equity, and 401(k) Full medical, dental, and vision insurance for you and your family HSA and FSA options to support your financial wellness Flexible time off — including parental leave Well-being programs — resources to support your mental and physical health Daily lunch & snacks Mentorship & impact — work closely with top AI leaders on products that ship Equality Opportunity StatementWe welcome and encourage applicants from all backgrounds. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, medical condition, veteran status, or any other legally protected status. We comply with applicable laws in every jurisdiction where we operate. Why You’ll Love Working Here Build something big — Be part of a fast-growing startup defining a new category: marketing orchestration powered by Agentic AI. Your work will matter — Trusted by Fortune 100 companies, our platform delivers 10x content velocity and 90% faster campaigns. A+ team — Collaborate with veterans from Adobe, Microsoft, Google, and top AI companies. Backed by the best — GV, Salesforce Ventures, Microsoft, Lightspeed, Madrona and Menlo ($165M raised). Recognized for innovation — TIME Best Inventions, Fast Company Next Big Thing in Tech, Gartner Cool Vendor, Adweek AI Company of the Year, LinkedIn Top Startup, Webby Award (AI Work & Productivity).
